r.s: An extension to track progress of a file upload.
r.d: See http://cvs.php.net/viewvc.cgi/pecl/uploadprogress/examples/ for a little example. PHP 5.2 is needed.
r.n: - Added uploadprogress_get_contents(id, fieldname) to return the contents of that file (Ben Ramsey) - Added uploadprogress.get_contents INI option to enable above function (Ben Ramsey) - Added a simple example - Minor Fixes
